★ 与 AmpKit LiNK HD 数字吉他界面兼容（即将推出）

★ Stereo effects support*
★ Compatible with Audiobus (input, effect, output)*
★ New "distant" mic position
★ VoiceOver improvements
★ Enhanced support for AmpKit LiNK HD digital guitar interface
★ Bug fixes

• Support for stereo USB interfaces: selectable Left or Right channel
• Remember device input and output gain on per-device basis
• Several bug fixes

New in 1.6:
• Stereo effects support*
• Compatible with Audiobus (input, effect
What's new chinese

SETLISTS

• Setlists deliver masterful control over your setups for playing live shows, practicing, or simply organizing groups of setups just the way you want them.
• You have total control of the order of setups within the Setlist.
• Each

iPad support! AmpKit 1.1 is now a universal app supporting iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch* at no extra cost. iPad features include:
- Full rotation support - works extremely well in both landscape and portrait modes.
- Great use of expanded screen r
Miscellaneous bug fixes

MASSIVE TONE IMPROVEMENTS
- Dual-stage Amp Simulation: Doubles the simulation fidelity of all AmpKit amps on newer iOS devices including iPhone 4, iPad 1 & 2, 4th generation iPod touch.
-Convolution-based Cabinet Simulation: Advanced technology

NEW Meteor Amp: Patterned after ENGL’s Fireball E625. It cranks a super tight response with a planet-sized punch that sends metal and rock solos into the upper stratosphere.  Boasting a remarkable low end distortion along side superior cleans, its 3 band

• Unlock All bundles - save up to 60% while getting ALL pedals, amps or both in one single package
• Inter-App Audio - pipe AmpKit's output directly into other IAA host apps!
• New export options - send your recordings via iMessage, share them throu

We added the option to export and import sessions from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive and other storage providers
We also squashed a couple of annoying bugs which were spoiling your AmpKit fun

First iOS 8 critical bug-fix release. Resolves issue with the onscreen keyboard popping up when AirTurn is on, and many other minor bugs. Audiobus 2.0 support is coming soon in the next update.
For our most loyal users we prepared a 'complete your gear

用于新IPAD的RETINA屏幕图像

- AmpKit再次一马当先，成为完全与新iPad的Retina屏幕兼容的第一批吉他应用程序之一。
- AmpKit的所有工具图像都已调整，完全适用于Retina屏幕分辨率。
- 亲眼看到才会相信， 新iPad上的AmpKit无论是外观还是声音都令人赞叹。

新的工具和预置音效

AmpKit 1.3 Gear Store添加了三种非常好的新工具，都以特价首次推出，另外还有14种极好的预置音效。

世界一
This update fixes Audiobus on iOS 7 and iOS 8
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
The issue with purchasing in-apps has been fixed.

• renamed some amps, cabs and pedals
• bugfixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

AMPKIT 1.8 PASSES THE 110 MARK, ADDS 4 SOUGHT-AFTER AMPS, 2 POWERFUL PEDALS

AmpKit 1.8 amplifies an already powerful gear library, bringing its total to 113 available amp channels, cabinets, pedals and mics. And with AmpKit, you can mix and match a

• renamed some amps, cabs and pedals
• bugfixes

绝佳新工具和预置音效
AmpKit 的Gear Store 不断扩大，目前新添 4 种精确模拟的有趣新产品，一定会激发吉他手和贝斯演奏者的灵感。AmpKit 选择的iOS 最佳程序现在包括 38 种单独模拟的通道，涉及 22 个放大器、26 个效果器、23 个音箱和 8 个麦克风。AmpKit 的预设乐库也因此扩大，目前共有 132 种预置音效。

更多世界一流的贝斯放大器：ASHDOWN ABM-900
AmpKit 继续为贝斯演奏者开拓道路，添加另一种世界级贝斯放大器，即 A
